title: I would like to offer a brief update about Server Transfers.

embed.description: In a few weeks, we'll start flagging accounts to claim their rewards once preseason kicks off in November. To ensure players don't miss out on their preseason rewards by transferring servers, we're going to disable them until November 20.

body:
I know a good majority of players have been posting with their concerns regarding what is going on with Server Transfers as well as when they will be back up.

As shown by the Edit from 11/21/2017 on the original "Account Transfers Going on Cooldown" post, there seem to be some technical issues going on with them which is why they have not returned to the store as of yet. 

I've had the very fortunate nature of speaking to an NA Player Support member personally, and even though they are not able to give us an exact date or time as to when these will return, they are hopeful for the near future. 

Stay strong friends. {{summoner:12}} will return.

(Sorry Porocles if this is not my place to post, you are more than welcome to copypasta this thread and put your name on it, I give you permission. That way it can be pinned for easier access.)

replies.body:
Just wanted to pop in and say Hi Mom!

Also, you can keep updated on everything regarding these transfers over on [**HollyMonsters post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) where they should be actively updating everyone!
